help_workflow.explanation:
Rules are logically separated by the following types:
- **Global rules**: These rules apply to every command, regardless of group, sub-group or name.
- **Group rules**: These rules apply to entire command groups, such as "admin".
- **Sub-group rules**: These rules apply to a specific sub-group of a specific group, such as "commands".
- **Command rules**: These rules apply to specific commands, such as "help".
Each one of these groups may apply to all channels or a specific channel only.

The rule precedence is as follows: _global rules > group rules > sub-group rules > command rules_. Rules that apply to all channels are applied before those that apply to specific channels only.

For example, to allow the execution of commands in a single channel only, you would need two rules:
1. :no_entry: Forbid the execution of all commands in every channel.
2. :white_check_mark: Allow the execution of all commands in a specific channel.

mudada.inactive_event_error: Alas, the event associated to this command is currently unavailable.

admin_give_gifts_workflow.too_many_gifts_error: You can't give more than **{amount:,}** <:bonbon:1196752635773079572> to a user at a time.
admin_give_gifts_workflow.successfully_added_gifts: I've delivered the gifts successfully. <@{user_id}> now has **{amount:,}** <:bonbon:1196752635773079572>.

admin_show_gifts_workflow.no_reservations_error: Alas, there doesn't seem to be any gifts, yet.

admin_take_gifts_workflow.too_few_gifts_error: You can't take fewer than 1 gifts from someone.
admin_take_gifts_workflow.user_has_no_gifts_error: <@{user_id}> has no gifts at all, there is nothing left to take.
admin_take_gifts_workflow.successfully_removed_gifts: I've snatched the gifts successfully. <@{user_id}> now has **{amount:,}** <:bonbon:1196752635773079572>.
admin_take_gifts_workflow.successfully_removed_gifts_from_all: I've snatched the gifts from everyone successfully.

admin_toggle_event_workflow.state_changed_successfully: I've updated the event state to **{state}**.

claim_gifts_workflow.no_gifts_error: Alas, you seem not to have any gifts at this present moment.
claim_gifts_workflow.embed_description:
Here are the gifts others have sent you. Don't forget to claim them!

{items}
claim_gifts_workflow.successful_claim: I've just brought {claim_amount:,} <:bonbon:1196752635773079572> to you. You now have {wallet_amount:,} <:bonbon:1196752635773079572>.

clear_gift_message_workflow.self_transfer_error: Silly, why would you want me to give you your own gifts?
clear_gift_message_workflow.missing_transaction_error: Alas, you haven't given <@{user_id}> any gifts, yet.
clear_gift_message_workflow.message_updated_successfully: I've removed your previously recorded message.

roll_messages:
Though today's egg might seem less promising, worry not! With my bunny enthusiasm, I assure you the next daily egg holds new promise. Stay curious and hopeful, for delightful surprises await!
Your reward is {amount:,} <:{emoji_name}:{emoji_id}>.

Wealth bounds forth! In my bunny charm, I unveil to you a golden egg, heralding a season rich with happiness.
Your reward is {amount:,} <:{emoji_name}:{emoji_id}>.

Fortune hops into your hands! Playfully adorned in my bunny attire, I bring you a golden egg of promise. Reap a joyful harvest!
Your reward is {amount:,} <:{emoji_name}:{emoji_id}>.

Treasure unfurls this Easter! As I embrace my inner bunny, I guide you to a wealth as plentiful as the spring's bloom.
Your reward is {amount:,} <:{emoji_name}:{emoji_id}>.

An egg-ceptional find this Easter! As I don playful bunny ears in celebration, my wisdom blesses you with a bounty as vibrant and joyful as the spring season itself.
Your reward is {amount:,} <:{emoji_name}:{emoji_id}>.
get_easter_daily_workflow.invalid_quest_error: Pray, forgive me, but I cannot find my notes about this quest.
get_easter_daily_workflow.quest_on_cooldown_error: Alas, you've cracked open an egg already. Check back tomorrow for more.
get_easter_daily_workflow.quest_unavailable_error: Pray, forgive me, this quest is currently not available.
get_easter_daily_workflow.quest_not_currently_available_error: Alas, you've already received your rewards today. Even the Easter Wolf needs to rest, so come back tomorrow.
get_easter_daily_workflow.choose_roll_message: Carefully choose one of the Easter Wolf's eggs to crack open.

give_gifts_workflow.invalid_gift_count_error: Alas, you can only transfer between **{min:,}** <:bonbon:1196752635773079572> and **{max:,}** <:bonbon:1196752635773079572> at a time. This cart can only hold so much...
give_gifts_workflow.message_too_long_error: Pray, forgive me, but I'd like to ask you to reformat your message so that it isn't longer than {max_length:,} characters.
give_gifts_workflow.self_transfer_error: Silly, why would you want me to give you your own gifts?
give_gifts_workflow.not_enough_gifts_error: Pray, forgive me but you don't have enough gifts for this transaction. You now have **{amount:,}** <:bonbon:1196752635773079572> left.
give_gifts_workflow.gift_finalized_already_error: Alas, your gift has been delivered to <@{user_id}> already, therefore you aren't able to change them anymore.
give_gifts_workflow.too_many_gifts_given_error: Alas, these gifts cannot be delivered to <@{user_id}> for you've already given them **{amount:,}** <:bonbon:1196752635773079572>. The maximum is **{max_amount:,}** <:bonbon:1196752635773079572> per person.
give_gifts_workflow.too_many_gifts_error: Alas, these gifts cannot be delivered to <@{user_id}>. You must give each person a number of gifts between **{min_amount:,}** <:bonbon:1196752635773079572> and **{max_amount:,}** <:bonbon:1196752635773079572>.
give_gifts_workflow.successful_transaction: I've delivered **{amount:,}** <:bonbon:1196752635773079572>  to <@{user_id}> successfully (**{target_amount:,}** <:bonbon:1196752635773079572> in total). You now have **{amount_left:,}** <:bonbon:1196752635773079572> left.

reset_reservations_workflow.nothing_to_return_error: You haven't given anyone any gifts, yet.
reset_reservations_workflow.successful_reset: I've retrieved all **{returned_amount:,}** <:bonbon:1196752635773079572>. You now have **{total_amount:,}** <:bonbon:1196752635773079572> left.

set_gift_message_workflow.self_transfer_error: Silly, why would you want me to give you your own gifts?
set_gift_message_workflow.message_too_long_error: Pray, forgive me, but I'd like to ask you to reformat your message so that it isn't longer than {max_length:,} characters.
set_gift_message_workflow.missing_transaction_error: Alas, you haven't given <@{user_id}> any gifts, yet.
set_gift_message_workflow.message_updated_successfully: I've taken note of your message.

show_reservations_workflow.no_reservations_error: Alas, you seem not to have given any gifts, yet.
show_reservations_workflow.embed_description: These are the gifts you have prepared. The listed users will receive their rewards at the end of the event, unless you make some changes to the gifts.

show_wallet_workflow.empty_wallet_error: Alas, it seems a mischievous wolf has eaten all your gifts <:bonbon:1196752635773079572>.
show_wallet_workflow.wallet_message: You are currently in possession of **{amount:,}** <:bonbon:1196752635773079572>.

take_gifts_workflow.invalid_gift_count_error: Alas, you can't take fewer than 1 <:bonbon:1196752635773079572>.
take_gifts_workflow.self_transfer_error: I appreciate your desire to give me some of your tasty gifts, but this time I'd prefer if you kept them.
take_gifts_workflow.missing_transaction_error: Alas, you haven't given <@{user_id}> any gifts, yet.
take_gifts_workflow.gift_finalized_already_error: Alas, your gift has been delivered to <@{user_id}> already, therefore you aren't able to change them anymore.
take_gifts_workflow.taken_less_successfully: I've retrieved the remaining **{taken_amount:,}** <:bonbon:1196752635773079572> from <@{user_id}>. You now have **{total_amount:,}** <:bonbon:1196752635773079572>.
take_gifts_workflow.taken_exact_successfully: I've retrieved **{taken_amount:,}** <:bonbon:1196752635773079572> from <@{user_id}>. You now have **{total_amount:,}** <:bonbon:1196752635773079572>.

remove_reminder_workflow.reminder_deleted: I have removed your reminder. However, tread cautiously like a vigilant hawk, lest it eludes your memory.
remove_reminder_workflow.reminder_not_found_error: There exists no such reminder in your repertoire. It is akin to seeking an apple in a barren desert.

set_reminder_workflow.message_out_of_range_error: The message's length ought to fall within the confines of {min} and {max} characters. Please, shorten your message ({actual_length} characters long currently) and try again.
set_reminder_workflow.invalid_params_error: The combination of {param1} and {param2} as parameters is not permissible. Please, try again.
set_reminder_workflow.too_many_reminders_error: It appears you have gathered a veritable menagerie of reminders, reaching the limit. Like an agile wolf selecting the juiciest apple to savor, choose one to remove and try anew.
set_reminder_workflow.invalid_time_input_error: Kindly inform me of the precise moment you wish for my gentle reminder.
set_reminder_workflow.time_input_parsing_error: It would be truly splendid if you could kindly tell me the time in a manner that I, too, can comprehend.

view_reminders_workflow.no_reminders: You do not have any reminders.
view_reminders_workflow.embed_footer: Use the reminder's number for removal.

reminder_processor.reminder_dm:
Behold, <@{user_id}>! Your reminder is beckoning your attention at its destined hour.
> {message}
reminder_processor.reminder_dm_no_message: Behold, <@{user_id}>! Your reminder is beckoning your attention at its destined hour... can you recall the subject, though?
reminder_processor.reminder_dm_belated:
<@{user_id}>, albeit late, your reminder is beckoning your attention:
> {message}

A service disruption hindered my ability to remind you at <t:{trigger_time}:f>. I kindly ask for your forgiveness.
reminder_processor.reminder_dm_belated_no_message:
<@{user_id}>, albeit late, your reminder is beckoning your attention... can you recall the subject, though?

A service disruption hindered my ability to remind you at <t:{trigger_time}:f>. I kindly ask for your forgiveness.
